name: @rebootmobility/nativescript-google-maps-sdk
description: Google Maps SDK plugin for Nativescript

scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-google-maps-sdk && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build
scripts.release:post: git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): New release version' && npm run git-tag && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post
scripts.version-and-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run merge-and-publish
scripts.merge-and-publish:pre: git checkout master && git merge develop
scripts.merge-and-publish: mv ../README.md .&& mv ../LICENSE . && npm publish && git reset --hard && git clean -f

author: Dan Prietti <dprietti@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dapriett)

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage: Please fix your commit message to match format.  For help, execute 'npm run cm'
